pull.title: build: Guard against accidental introduction of new Boost dependencies
pull.body:
Guard against accidental introduction of new Boost dependencies.

Context: #13383 â€“ the usage of `boost::lexical_cast` was introduced in #11517 from December 2017

events.message: build: Guard against accidental introduction of new Boost dependencies

events.body:
Updated version: Removed `boost/lexical_cast.hpp` from `EXPECTED_BOOST_INCLUDES` now that #13383 has been merged. Added logic that notifies the operator when a previous dependency has been removed, asking for an update of `EXPECTED_BOOST_INCLUDES`.

@laanwj Please re-review :-)

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13230 (Simplify include analysis by enforcing the developer guide's include syntax)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
@DrahtBot I'll simply rebase once one of them is merged :-)
